prompt: A full art illustration of an uncommon, mystical swamp beast called the Phantom Serpent. The creature is an ethereal, ghostly snake-like being with translucent scales that emit a faint, eerie glow. It slithers through the misty swamp, coiling around ancient trees and weaving through glowing plants. The setting is shrouded in mist with dark, towering trees and luminescent flora adding to the mysterious and enchanting atmosphere. The colors are dark and vibrant, with eerie lighting and mystical symbols subtly integrated into the natural elements of the swamp.
